description: Common meta info, not specific to any code

metaInfos.description: Charge of each atom in the molecule.
metaInfos.name: atom_in_molecule_charge

metaInfos.description: Name (label) of each atom in the molecule.
metaInfos.name: atom_in_molecule_name

metaInfos.description: Reference to the atom type of each atom in the molecule.
metaInfos.name: atom_in_molecule_to_atom_type_ref

metaInfos.description: Table mapping atom to molecules: the first column is the index of the molecule and the second column the index of the atom, signifying that the atom in the second column belongs to the molecule in the first column in the same row.
metaInfos.name: atom_to_molecule

metaInfos.description: Charge of the atom type.
metaInfos.name: atom_type_charge

metaInfos.description: Mass of the atom type.
metaInfos.name: atom_type_mass

metaInfos.description: Name (label) of the atom type.
metaInfos.name: atom_type_name

metaInfos.description: List of the indexes involved in this constraint. The fist atom has index 1, the last number_of_topology_atoms.
metaInfos.name: constraint_atoms

metaInfos.description: Short and unique name for this constraint type. Valid names are described in the [constraint\_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/constraint-kind).
metaInfos.name: constraint_kind

metaInfos.description: Explicit constraint parameters for this kind of constraint (depending on the constraint type, some might be given implicitly through other means).
metaInfos.name: constraint_parameters

metaInfos.description: Type of DFT+U functional (such as DFT/DFT+U double-counting compensation). Valid names are described in the [dft\_plus\_u\_functional wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/dft-plus-u-functional).
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_functional

metaInfos.description: DFT+U-orbital setting: atom index (references index of atom_labels/atom_positions)
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_orbital_atom

metaInfos.description: DFT+U-orbital setting: value J (exchange interaction)
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_orbital_J

metaInfos.description: DFT+U-orbital setting: orbital label (normally (n,l)), notation: '3d', '4f', ...
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_orbital_label

metaInfos.description: DFT+U-orbital setting: value U_{effective} (U-J), if implementation uses it
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_orbital_U_effective

metaInfos.description: DFT+U-orbital setting: value U (on-site Coulomb interaction)
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_orbital_U

metaInfos.description: DFT+U: Type of orbitals used for projection in order to calculate occupation numbers. Valid names are described in the [dft\_plus\_u\_projection\_type wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/dft-plus-u-projection-type).
metaInfos.name: dft_plus_u_projection_type

metaInfos.description: Component of the correlation (C) energy at the GGA (or MetaGGA) level using the self-consistent density of the target XC functional (full unscaled value, i.e., not scaled due to exact-exchange mixing).
metaInfos.name: energy_C_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Fermi energy (separates occupied from unoccupied single-particle states in metals) during the self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_reference_fermi_iteration

metaInfos.description: Fermi energy (separates occupied from unoccupied single-particle states in metals)
metaInfos.name: energy_reference_fermi

metaInfos.description: Highest occupied single-particle state energy (in insulators or HOMO energy in finite systems) during the self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_reference_highest_occupied_iteration

metaInfos.description: Highest occupied single-particle state energy (in insulators or HOMO energy in finite systems)
metaInfos.name: energy_reference_highest_occupied

metaInfos.description: Lowest unoccupied single-particle state energy (in insulators or LUMO energy in finite systems) during the self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_reference_lowest_unoccupied_iteration

metaInfos.description: Lowest unoccupied single-particle state energy (in insulators or LUMO energy in finite systems)
metaInfos.name: energy_reference_lowest_unoccupied

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the GGA (or MetaGGA) level, using the self consistent density of the target functional, scaled accordingly to the mixing parameter.
metaInfos.name: energy_X_mGGA_scaled

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the GGA (or MetaGGA) level using the self consistent density of the target functional (full unscaled value, i.e., not scaled due to exact-exchange mixing).
metaInfos.name: energy_X_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Excitation energies.
metaInfos.name: excitation_energies

metaInfos.description: Cutoff type for the calculation of the bare Coulomb potential: none, 0d, 1d, 2d. See Rozzi et al., PRB 73, 205119 (2006)
metaInfos.name: gw_bare_coulomb_cutofftype

metaInfos.description: GW Fermi energy
metaInfos.name: gw_fermi_energy

metaInfos.description: GW fundamental band gap
metaInfos.name: gw_fundamental_gap

metaInfos.description: GW optical band gap
metaInfos.name: gw_optical_gap

metaInfos.description: Maximum G for the pw basis for the Coulomb potential.
metaInfos.name: gw_bare_coulomb_gmax

metaInfos.description: Auxillary basis set used for non-local operators: mixed - mixed basis set, Kotani and Schilfgaarde, Solid State Comm. 121, 461 (2002).
metaInfos.name: gw_basis_set

metaInfos.description: It specifies whether the core states are treated in the GW calculation: all - All electron calculation; val - Valence electron only calculation; vab - Core electrons are excluded from the mixed product basis; xal - All electron treatment of the exchange self-energy only
metaInfos.name: gw_core_treatment

metaInfos.description: Frequency integration grid type for the correlational self energy: 'eqdis' - equidistant frequencies from 0 to freqmax; 'gaulag' - Gauss-Laguerre quadrature from 0 to infinity; 'gauleg' - Gauss-Legendre quadrature from 0 to freqmax; 'gaule2' (default) - double Gauss-Legendre quadrature from 0 to freqmax and from freqmax to infinity.
metaInfos.name: gw_frequency_grid_type

metaInfos.description: Maximum frequency for the calculation of the self energy.
metaInfos.name: gw_max_frequency

metaInfos.description: Cut-off parameter for the truncation of the expansion of the plane waves in the interstitial region.
metaInfos.name: gw_mixed_basis_gmax

metaInfos.description: Maximum l value used for the radial functions within the muffin-tin.
metaInfos.name: gw_mixed_basis_lmax

metaInfos.description: Eigenvalue threshold below which the egenvectors are discarded in the construction of the radial basis set.
metaInfos.name: gw_mixed_basis_tolerance

metaInfos.description: k/q-point grid size used in the GW calculation.
metaInfos.name: gw_ngridq

metaInfos.description: Number referring to the frequency used in the calculation of the self energy.
metaInfos.name: gw_frequency_number

metaInfos.description: Values of the frequency used in the calculation of the self energy.
metaInfos.name: gw_frequency_values

metaInfos.description: Weights of the frequency used in the calculation of the self energy.
metaInfos.name: gw_frequency_weights

metaInfos.description: Number of frequency points used in the calculation of the self energy.
metaInfos.name: gw_number_of_frequencies

metaInfos.description: Number of empty states used to compute the polarizability P
metaInfos.name: gw_polarizability_number_of_empty_states

metaInfos.description: Methods to solve the quasi-particle equation: 'linearization', 'self-consistent'
metaInfos.name: gw_qp_equation_treatment

metaInfos.description: Linearization prefactor
metaInfos.name: gw_qp_linearization_prefactor

metaInfos.description: Type of volume averaging for the dynamically screened Coulomb potential: isotropic - Simple averaging along a specified direction using only diagonal components of the dielectric tensor; anisotropic - Anisotropic screening by C. Freysoldt et al., CPC 176, 1-13 (2007)
metaInfos.name: gw_screened_coulomb_volume_average

metaInfos.description: Model used to calculate the dinamically-screened Coulomb potential: 'rpa' - Full-frequency random-phase approximation; 'ppm' - Godby-Needs plasmon-pole model Godby and Needs, Phys. Rev. Lett. 62, 1169 (1989); 'ppm_hl' - Hybertsen and Louie, Phys. Rev. B 34, 5390 (1986); 'ppm_lh' - von der Linden and P. Horsh, Phys. Rev. B 37, 8351 (1988); 'ppm_fe' - Farid and Engel, Phys. Rev. B 47,15931 (1993); 'cdm' - Contour deformation method, Phys. Rev. B 67, 155208 (2003).)
metaInfos.name: gw_screened_Coulomb

metaInfos.description: Models for the correlation self-energy analytical continuation: 'pade' -  Pade's approximant (by H. J. Vidberg and J. W. Serence, J. Low Temp. Phys. 29, 179 (1977)); 'mpf' -  Multi-Pole Fitting (by H. N Rojas, R. W. Godby and R. J. Needs, Phys. Rev. Lett. 74, 1827 (1995)); 'cd' - contour deformation; 'ra' - real axis
metaInfos.name: gw_self_energy_c_analytical_continuation

metaInfos.description: Number of empty states to be used to calculate the correlation self energy.
metaInfos.name: gw_self_energy_c_number_of_empty_states

metaInfos.description: Number of poles used in the analytical continuation.
metaInfos.name: gw_self_energy_c_number_of_poles

metaInfos.description: Diagonal matrix elements of the correlation self-energy
metaInfos.name: gw_self_energy_c

metaInfos.description: Treatment of the integrable singular terms in the calculation of the self energy. Values: 'mpb' - Auxiliary function method by S. Massidda, M. Posternak, and A. Baldereschi, PRB 48, 5058 (1993); 'crg' - Auxiliary function method by P. Carrier, S. Rohra, and A. Goerling, PRB 75, 205126 (2007).
metaInfos.name: gw_self_energy_singularity_treatment

metaInfos.description: Diagonal matrix elements of the exchange self-energy
metaInfos.name: gw_self_energy_x

metaInfos.description: Exchange-correlation functional of the ground-state calculation. See XC_functional list at https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/XC-functional
metaInfos.name: gw_starting_point

metaInfos.description: GW methodology: exciting test variable
metaInfos.name: gw_type_test

metaInfos.description: GW methodology: G0W0; ev-scGW: (eigenvalues self-consistent GW) – Phys.Rev.B 34, 5390 (1986); qp-scGW: (quasi-particle self-consistent GW) – Phys. Rev. Lett. 96, 226402 (2006)  scGW0: (self-consistent G with fixed W0) – Phys.Rev.B 54, 8411 (1996); scG0W: (self-consistent W with fixed G0); scGW: (self-consistent GW) – Phys. Rev. B 88, 075105 (2013)
metaInfos.name: gw_type

metaInfos.description: Diagonal matrix elements of the exchange-correlation potential
metaInfos.name: gw_xc_potential

metaInfos.description: List of the indexes involved in this interaction. The fist atom has index 1, the last atom index number_of_topology_atoms.
metaInfos.name: interaction_atoms

metaInfos.description: Short and unique name for this interaction type. Valid names are described in the [interaction\_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/interaction-kind).
metaInfos.name: interaction_kind

metaInfos.description: Explicit interaction parameters for this kind of interaction (depending on the interaction_kind some might be given implicitly through other means).
metaInfos.name: interaction_parameters

metaInfos.description: Reference to an atom-centered basis set defined in section_basis_set_atom_centered and to the atom kind as defined in section_method_atom_kind.
metaInfos.name: mapping_section_method_basis_set_atom_centered

metaInfos.description: Reference to a cell-associated basis set.
metaInfos.name: mapping_section_method_basis_set_cell_associated

metaInfos.description: String describing the use of the basis set, i.e, if it used for expanding a wavefunction or an electron density. Allowed values are listed in the [basis\_set\_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-kind).
metaInfos.name: method_basis_set_kind

metaInfos.description: Reference to the topology and force fields to be used.
metaInfos.name: method_to_topology_ref

metaInfos.description: List of the indexes involved in this constraint. The fist atom has index 1, the last index is number_of_atoms_in_molecule.
metaInfos.name: molecule_constraint_atoms

metaInfos.description: Short and unique name for this constraint type. Valid names are described in the [constraint\_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/constraint-kind).
metaInfos.name: molecule_constraint_kind

metaInfos.description: Explicit constraint parameters for this kind of constraint (depending on the constraint type some might be given implicitly through other means).
metaInfos.name: molecule_constraint_parameters

metaInfos.description: List of the indexes involved in this bonded interaction within a molecule. The first atom has index 1, the last index is number_of_atoms_in_.
metaInfos.name: molecule_interaction_atoms

metaInfos.description: Short and unique name for this interaction type, used for bonded interactions for atoms in a molecule. Valid names are described in the [interaction\_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/interaction-kind).
metaInfos.name: molecule_interaction_kind

metaInfos.description: Explicit interaction parameters for this kind of interaction (depending on the interaction type some might be given implicitly through other means), used for bonded interactions for atoms in a molecule.
metaInfos.name: molecule_interaction_parameters

metaInfos.description: Mapping from molecules to molecule types.
metaInfos.name: molecule_to_molecule_type_map

metaInfos.description: Name of the molecule.
metaInfos.name: molecule_type_name

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms in this molecule.
metaInfos.name: number_of_atoms_in_molecule

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms involved in this constraint.
metaInfos.name: number_of_atoms_per_constraint

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms involved in this interaction.
metaInfos.name: number_of_atoms_per_interaction

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms, in this molecule, involved in this constraint.
metaInfos.name: number_of_atoms_per_molecule_constraint

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms, in this molecule, involved in this interaction.
metaInfos.name: number_of_atoms_per_molecule_interaction

metaInfos.description: String describing the use of the basis set, i.e, if it used for expanding a wavefunction or an electron density. Allowed values are listed in the [basis\_set\_kind wiki page](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/basis-set-kind).
metaInfos.name: number_of_basis_sets_atom_centered

metaInfos.description: Number of constraints of this type.
metaInfos.name: number_of_constraints

metaInfos.description: Number of electrons in system
metaInfos.name: number_of_electrons

metaInfos.description: Number of excited states.
metaInfos.name: number_of_excited_states

metaInfos.description: Number of interactions of this type.
metaInfos.name: number_of_interactions

metaInfos.description: Number of constraints of this type.
metaInfos.name: number_of_molecule_constraints

metaInfos.description: Number of bonded interactions of this type.
metaInfos.name: number_of_molecule_interactions

metaInfos.description: number of soap coefficients
metaInfos.name: number_of_soap_coefficients

metaInfos.description: Number of atoms in the system described by this topology.
metaInfos.name: number_of_topology_atoms

metaInfos.description: Number of molecules in the system, as described by this topology.
metaInfos.name: number_of_topology_molecules

metaInfos.description: Excited states oscillator strengths.
metaInfos.name: oscillator_strengths

metaInfos.description: The top level context containing the reponse to an api query, when using jsonAPI they are tipically in the meta part
metaInfos.name: response_context

metaInfos.description: How many times this message was repeated
metaInfos.name: response_message_count

metaInfos.description: level of the message: 0 fatal, 1 error, 2 warning, 3 debug
metaInfos.name: response_message_level

metaInfos.description: Message outputted by the program formatting the data in the current format
metaInfos.name: response_message

metaInfos.description: Section describing a type of atom in the system.
metaInfos.name: section_atom_type

metaInfos.description: Section describing a constraint between arbitrary atoms.
metaInfos.name: section_constraint

metaInfos.description: Section for DFT+U-settings of a single orbital
metaInfos.name: section_dft_plus_u_orbital

metaInfos.description: Excited states properties.
metaInfos.name: section_excited_states

metaInfos.description: Section containing the description of a bonded interaction between arbitrary atoms.
metaInfos.name: section_interaction

metaInfos.description: This section contains the definition of the basis sets that are defined independently of the atomic configuration.
metaInfos.name: section_method_basis_set

metaInfos.description: Section describing a constraint between atoms within a molecule.
metaInfos.name: section_molecule_constraint

metaInfos.description: Section describing a bonded interaction between atoms within a molecule.
metaInfos.name: section_molecule_interaction

metaInfos.description: Section describing a type of molecule in the system.
metaInfos.name: section_molecule_type

metaInfos.description: Messages outputted by the program formatting the data in the current response
metaInfos.name: section_response_message

metaInfos.description: Stores the soap coefficients for the pair of atoms given in soap_coefficients_atom_pair.
metaInfos.name: section_soap_coefficients

metaInfos.description: Stores a soap descriptor for this configuration.
metaInfos.name: section_soap

metaInfos.description: Section containing the definition of topology (connectivity among atoms in force fileds), force field, and constraints of a system.
metaInfos.name: section_topology

metaInfos.description: Parameters of an atom within a molecule.
metaInfos.name: settings_atom_in_molecule

metaInfos.description: Some parameters that describe a constraint
metaInfos.name: settings_constraint

metaInfos.description: Some parameters that describe a bonded interaction.
metaInfos.name: settings_interaction

metaInfos.description: A meta info whose corresponding data has been shortened
metaInfos.name: shortened_meta_info

metaInfos.description: angular basis L
metaInfos.name: soap_angular_basis_L

metaInfos.description: angular basis type
metaInfos.name: soap_angular_basis_type

values.spherical-harmonic: Uses spherical harmonics for the angular basis

metaInfos.description: Pair of atoms described in the current section
metaInfos.name: soap_coefficients_atom_pair

metaInfos.description: Compressed coefficient of the soap descriptor for the atom pair soap_coefficients_atom_pair
metaInfos.name: soap_coefficients

metaInfos.description: kernel adaptor
metaInfos.name: soap_kernel_adaptor

metaInfos.description: Unique checksum of all the soap parameters (all those with abstract type soap_parameter) with prefix psoap
metaInfos.name: soap_parameters_gid

metaInfos.description: A soap parameter
metaInfos.name: soap_parameter

metaInfos.description: radial basis integration steps
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_basis_integration_steps

metaInfos.description: radial basis mode
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_basis_mode

metaInfos.description: radial basis N
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_basis_n

metaInfos.description: radial basis sigma
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_basis_sigma

metaInfos.description: radial basis type
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_basis_type

metaInfos.description: radial cutoff center weight
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_cutoff_center_weight

metaInfos.description: radial cutoff width
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_cutoff_rc_width

metaInfos.description: radial cutoff
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_cutoff_rc

metaInfos.description: radial cutoff type
metaInfos.name: soap_radial_cutoff_type

metaInfos.description: 2l1 norm spectrum
metaInfos.name: soap_spectrum_2l1_norm

metaInfos.description: global spectrum
metaInfos.name: soap_spectrum_global

metaInfos.description: gradients in specturm
metaInfos.name: soap_spectrum_gradients

metaInfos.description: Type list
metaInfos.name: soap_type_list

metaInfos.description: A unique string idenfiying the force field defined in this section. Strategies to define it are discussed in the [topology\_force\_field\_name](https://gitlab.mpcdf.mpg.de/nomad-lab/nomad-meta-info/wikis/metainfo/topology-force-field-name).
metaInfos.name: topology_force_field_name

metaInfos.description: Reference to the topology used for this system; if not given, the trivial topology should be assumed.
metaInfos.name: topology_ref

metaInfos.description: Transition dipole moments.
metaInfos.name: transition_dipole_moments
